name: Remove quick edit
author: Sebastián Barría

sections.description:
This plugin removes the “quick edit” button located in the pages and posts list, by using CSS. Ideal to use with qTranslate

Usage

Just activate the pluggin and the “quick edit” button will automatically dissapear in “edit pages” and “edit posts” sections of the admin panel.
sections.installation: Just install and activate. Once activated the “quick edit” button will automatically dissapear.
sections.faq:
Where do I get more information?

In the plugin page
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Fixed a problem with the insertion of the code in the admin page (wich affects functionallity on some pages)

1.0

  • This is the first release
